description: AI-powered mood-based travel discovery platform that helps users discover and book travel experiences based on their emotional state, not just location or price

src/.app/: Next.js App Router - pages and layouts

claude/.subagents/: Specialized Claude agents for development tasks

MoodPicker.purpose: Interactive mood selection interface with 6+ mood categories

TripRecommendations.purpose: Display travel recommendations based on selected mood

HomePage.purpose: Main application entry point with mood selection flow

typeDefinitions.Mood: Core mood interface with id, name, emoji, description, color, gradient
typeDefinitions.TripIntent: Travel intention interface for user preferences
typeDefinitions.UserPreferences: Complete user preference state including mood, budget, flexibility
typeDefinitions.TravelExperience: Travel recommendation interface with destination, cost, activities

subagents.bug-finder: Error detection, debugging, and code quality
subagents.test-manager: Test creation, validation, and coverage analysis

hooks.auto-commit: Smart GitHub commits with validation checks

scripts.auto-commit-hook.sh: Automated commit workflow with safety checks

designPrinciples: Clean, minimalist aesthetic inspired by Calm, Airbnb, Notion
Soft color palette with pastel/neutral tones

contextNotes.aiStrategy: Focus on mood interpretation rather than traditional search
contextNotes.userExperience: Emotional journey from mood to travel decision
contextNotes.dataStrategy: Transition from mock data to real travel APIs
contextNotes.scalabilityPlan: Modular component architecture for easy expansion
contextNotes.securityConsiderations: NextAuth.js integration, API key management, user data privacy
